name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PlanMoreTrips - We Find The Cheapest Flights

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PlanMoreTrips - Automatically double-check the price of flights & hotels to make sure you getting the absolute best deal.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically save money when booking travel online!

PlanMoreTrips uses AI to double-check the price of any flight, hotel, car, or activity against over 1,000+ travel sites including Google Flights, Airbnb, Kayak, SkyScanner, United, Hotels.com, and many more.

No more having to check different travel sites for the best price.

1) Install Free PlanMoreTrips Extension
2) Search Your Favorite Travel Sites For Your Flights & Hotels
3) PlanMoreTrips Will Automatically Double-Check If It Is Cheaper Anywhere Else
4) Book Your Trip & Save Money

If you have any issues or new feature requests, you can send us an email at help@planmoretrips.com
